title: Categorize Image: Text Overlay
description: Select the category that best describes this image:

options.name: Phone number
options.description: The photo contains an overlay that shows a phone number.

options.name: Name
options.description: The photo contains an overlay with what appears to be a person name.

options.name: Name AND phone number
options.description: The photo several overlays, showing both a name and a phone number.

options.name: Other
options.description: None of the overlays contain a phone number of a name.
